subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Darren Helm and Henrik Zetterberg scored in the first period for Detroit in a 2-1 victory Saturday that gave the Red Wings a 2-0 lead in the Western Conference finals.
snippet: Darren Helm and Henrik Zetterberg scored in the first period for Detroit in a 2-1 victory Saturday that gave the Red Wings a 2-0 lead in the Western Conference finals.
